name: Playstation
longDescription: Super-OS 2023.04 is designed to run on all modern PCs with excellent performance and compatibility.

name: Super-OS
longDescription: Super-OS 2024 introduces enhanced security, faster boot times, and improved hardware support.

name: Hyper-OS Lite
longDescription: Hyper-OS Lite is optimized for low-end devices while remaining stable and easy to use.

name: Hyper-OS-Pro
longDescription: Hyper-OS Pro provides enterprise-level security, reliability, and long-term support.

name: MegaSuite-Office
longDescription: MegaSuite Office includes tools for documents, spreadsheets, and presentations with cloud support.

name: DevCore-IDE
longDescription: DevCore IDE 6.0 offers AI-assisted coding, debugging tools, and multi-language support.

name: CloudSync
longDescription: CloudSync enables secure storage and synchronization of files across all devices.

name: SecureShield-Antivirus
longDescription: SecureShield Antivirus protects your system against malware, ransomware, and phishing attacks.

name: MediaBox-Player
longDescription: MediaBox Player supports all major audio and video formats with a modern interface.

name: AnalyticsPro
longDescription: AnalyticsPro helps teams visualize data and generate actionable business insights.
